alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lincoln, east central Cumberland and central Sagadahoc Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bath, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Bath, Topsham, Wiscasset, Georgetown, Woolwich, Harpswell, Boothbay, Bowdoin, Bowdoinham, Dresden, Arowsic, Westport, West Bath, Richmond and Phippsburg. This includes Interstate 295 between mile markers 35 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
